P.HT: Forms and templates for access procedures
Template for the request to establish a CSD link or for the request for access between a CSD and a CCP or a trading venue

ROW.CELL: Reference number given by the requesting party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request (name, function, phone number, email address)

TXT.HT: Services that form the object of the request

ROW.CELL: Name and contact details of the competent authority of the requesting party
Name and contact details of the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the response granting access following a request to establish a CSD link or a request for access between a CSD and a CCP or a trading venue

ROW.CELL: Reference number given by the requesting party
Date of receipt of the request for access
Reference number given by the receiving party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request (name, function, phone number, email address)
Corporate name of the requesting party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request (name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the competent authority of the receiving party (main liaison, name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014 (main liaison, name, function, phone number, email address)

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the refusal of access to a CSD

ROW.CELL: Reference number given by the requesting party
Date of receipt of the request for access
Reference number given by the receiving CSD
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access
Corporate name of the requesting party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request for access

TXT.HT: Risk analysis of the request for access

ROW.CELL: Legal risks resulting from the provision of services
Financial risks resulting from the provision of services
Operational risks resulting from the provision of services
Access would affect the risk profile of the CSD
Access would affect the smooth and orderly functioning of the financial markets
In case of refusal of access, a summary of the reasons for such a refusal
Deadline for complaint by the requesting party to the competent authority of the receiving CSD
Name and contact details of the competent authority of the receiving CSD
Name and contact details of the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the refusal of access to the transaction feeds of a CCP or a trading venue

ROW.CELL: Reference number given by the requesting CSD
Date of receipt of the request for access
Reference number given by the receiving party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)
Corporate name of the requesting CSD
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)

TXT.HT: Risk analysis of the request for access

ROW.CELL: Risks resulting from the provision of services
Access would affect the smooth and orderly functioning of the financial markets
A summary of the reasons for such a refusal
Deadline for complaint by the requesting CSD to the competent authority of the receiving party
Name and contact details of the competent authority of the receiving party (main liaison, name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014 (main liaison, name, function, phone number, email address)

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the complaint for refusal of access to a CSD

ROW.CELL: Addressee: competent authority of receiving CSD
Reference number given by the requesting party
Date of receipt of request for access
Reference number given by the receiving CSD
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)
Corporate name of the receiving CSD
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access

TXT.HT: Comments of the requesting party in relation to the risk assessment of the request for access conducted by the receiving CSD and the reasons for refusal of access

ROW.CELL: Comments of the requesting party on the legal risks resulting from the provision of services
Comments of the requesting party on the financial risks resulting from the provision of services
Comments of the requesting party on the operational risks resulting from the provision of services

Comments of the requesting party concerning the refusal to provide the services referred to in point (1) of Section A of the Annex to Regulation (EU) No 909/2014 applicable to the specific issue of securities.
Comments of the requesting party on the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access
Copy of the initial application for access submitted by the requesting party to the receiving CSD
Copy of the response of the receiving CSD to the initial request for access

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the complaint for refusal of access to the transaction feeds of a CCP or a trading venue

ROW.CELL: Addressee: competent authority of receiving party
Reference number given by the requesting CSD
Date of receipt of request for access
Reference number given by the receiving party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access

TXT.HT: Comments of the requesting CSD in relation to the risk assessment of the request for access conducted by the receiving party and the reasons for refusal of access

ROW.CELL: Comments of the requesting CSD on the risks resulting from the provision of services
Comments of the requesting CSD on the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access
Copy of the initial application for access submitted by the requesting CSD to the receiving party
Copy of the response of the receiving party to the initial request for access

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the consultation of other authorities on the assessment of refusal of access or for referral to ESMA

ROW.CELL: Sender: competent authority of the receiving party

NP.TXT: the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting participant; or
the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting issuer; or
the competent authority of the requesting CSD and the relevant authority of the requesting CSD referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014; or
the competent authority of the requesting CCP or trading venue and the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014; or
ESMA (in case of referral to ESMA)

ROW.CELL: Date of the request for access
Reference number given by the requesting party
Date of receipt of the request for access
Reference number given by the receiving party
Date of receipt of refusal of access complaint
Reference number given by the competent authority of the receiving party
Name and contact details of the competent authority of the receiving party
Where applicable, name and contact details of the relevant authority of the receiving party referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014
Name and contact details of the person assuming the responsibility of the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access

TXT.HT: Assessment by the competent authority of the receiving party

CELL.P: Comments of the competent authority concerning:

NP.TXT: the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access, and
the arguments of the requesting party

ROW.CELL: Where applicable, comments of the relevant authority of the receiving party referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014
Refusal to grant access is deemed unjustified
Reasons provided by the competent authority of the receiving party in support of its assessment
Copy of the initial application for access submitted by the requesting party to the receiving party
Copy of the response of the receiving party to the initial request for access
Copy of the complaint from the requesting party regarding the refusal of access

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the response to the consultation by the competent authority or other authorities on the assessment of refusal of access, and for referral to ESMA

NP.TXT: the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting participant; or
the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting issuer; or
the competent authority of the requesting CSD and the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014; or
the competent authority of the requesting CCP or trading venue and the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014.
competent authority of the receiving party; or
ESMA

ROW.CELL: Date of the request for access
Reference number given by the requesting party
Date of receipt of the request for access
Reference number given by the receiving party
Date of receipt of the complaint for refusal of access
Reference number given by the competent authority of the receiving party
Date of receipt of the assessment provided by the competent authority to the receiving party
Reference number given by the competent authority of the requesting party

TXT.HT: Identification of the authority that submits the response to the assessment by the competent authority of the receiving party

NP.TXT: the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting participant; or
the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting issuer; or
the competent authority of the requesting CSD and the relevant authority of the requesting CSD referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014; or
the competent authority of the requesting CCP or trading venue and the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014.

ROW.CELL: Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access

TXT.HT: Assessment by the competent authority of the receiving party

NP.TXT: the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access;
the arguments provided by the requesting party;
the reasons provided by the competent authority of the receiving party in support of its assessment.

ROW.CELL: Refusal to grant access is deemed unjustified
Reasons provided by the authority in support of its assessment

TXT.HT: Where relevant, assessment by the relevant authority of the requesting party referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014

NP.TXT: the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access;
the arguments provided by the requesting party;
the reasons provided by the competent authority of the receiving party in support of its assessment.

ROW.CELL: Refusal to grant access is deemed unjustified
Reasons provided by the authority in support of its assessment
Copy of the complaint of the requesting party regarding the refusal of access, including a copy of the information provided under Annex I

Copy of the assessment by the competent authority of the receiving party of the complaint launched by the requesting party concerning the refusal of access, including a copy of the information provided under Annex II

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents

P.HT: Template for the response to the complaint for refusal of access

ROW.CELL: Sender: competent authority of the receiving party

NP.TXT: requesting party;
receiving party;
the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting participant; or
the competent authority of the place of establishment of the requesting issuer; or
in case of CSD links, the competent authority of the requesting CSD and the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014; or

in case of access by a trading venue or a CCP, the competent authority of the requesting CCP or trading venue and the relevant authority referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014.

ROW.CELL: Date of the request for access
Reference number given by the requesting party
Date of receipt of the request for access
Reference number given by the receiving party
Date of receipt of the complaint for refusal of access
Reference number given by the competent authority of the receiving party

Date of receipt of the assessment by the competent authority of the requesting party and, where applicable, of the relevant authority of the requesting party referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014

Reference number given by the competent authority of the requesting party or, where applicable, of the relevant authority of the requesting party referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014

TXT.HT: Identification of the authority submitting the response to the complaint concerning a refusal of access

ROW.CELL: Name and contact details of the competent authority of the receiving party
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the request for access (name, function, phone number, email address)
Name and contact details of the person responsible for the assessment of the request for access

TXT.HT: Assessment by the competent authority of the receiving party

NP.TXT: the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access;
the arguments provided by the requesting party;
the reasons provided by the authority of the requesting party in support of its assessment.

CELL.P: Where applicable, comments of the relevant authority of the receiving party referred to in point (a) of Article 12(1) of Regulation (EU) No 909/2014 concerning:

NP.TXT: the reasons of the receiving party for refusal of access;
the arguments provided by the requesting party;
the reasons provided by the authority of the requesting party in support of its assessment.

ROW.CELL: Refusal to grant access is deemed unjustified
Reasons provided by the competent authority of the receiving party in support of its assessment

TXT.HT: Order requiring the receiving party to grant access to the requesting party

ROW.CELL: When the refusal to grant access is deemed unjustified, a copy of the order requiring the receiving party to grant access to the requesting party, including the applicable deadline for compliance.

TXT.HT: Any other relevant information and/or documents
